background: As a team leader, you have several projects requiring different expertise levels in different areas. You want to assign a set of people to these projects. Each person has a level of expertise in each of the areas. How to assign people to projects to minimize the maximum skill shortage from the project expertise requirement?
constraints: Each person should be assigned to only one project
Attained skill level for each project is the maximum level of individuals assigned to the project
objective: The maximum skill shortage over all projects
description: As a team leader, you have several projects requiring different expertise levels in different areas. You want to assign a set of people to these projects. Each person has a level of expertise in each of the areas. How to assign people to projects to minimize the maximum skill shortage from the project expertise requirement?

parameters.definition: The number of people or staff
The number of skills or expertise
Required level of skill `s` for project `c`
